Subject: Autobots - Decepticons - Chivitrons

Priority: normal

From: "r/\uq" <rauq@...>

--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop / Strafe / Afterburner / Nosecone ---
--- Astroblast \ Abominus \ Switchblade ---
--- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk --- 

Pacifix gazes grimmly at the retreating Decepticons. Not liking to 
let them go, he notes that the Autobots will have to be prepared for 
them next time. He ponders his decision for a minute then come 
back to the present. "CLIFFJUMPER!" He yells, heading over. 
Strafe and the other technobots are close behind.

Swoop circles over head, a worried look on his robotic dinosaur 
face. "Me Swoop worried about Cliffjumper." (lol)

Crossroads drags himself off the wall, a little dazed, and tries to 
focus on his surroundings.

>|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  

Astroblast frowns as he awaits further updates from Abominus and 
Stratus... well, scratch Abominus. Impatiently, he sends a 
commlink to Stratus, "Grrr, well? What is your progress."

Abominus, deep underwater, just understands Stratus' commands. 
"Abominus.... fo.... foll.... crussshhhh...." He swims towards 
Stratus, heading in the intended direction.

>|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  

Switchblade ignores Ragnus for a while, then he shakes slightly as 
as several missiles smash into the top of the ship, charring the 
medium armour plating. "Wha?" He exclaims, "An attack?" He 
grumbles to himeself for a second, the turns to the other bot, "Bah, 
go out there are play with--" He checks the scanners, and they 
pick up a jet, "The jet outside. We need to get the ship down to 
Jamaica, and they aren't helping. I'll keep them busy with the 
limited weapons we have on the top of the ship while you get out 
there." As he finishes, a missiles pod, and two autoguns fold out of 
the side of the ship. The autoguns send a barrage of thiry bullets, 
and the missiles pod launches two missile, both at the incomming 
jet.

>|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  >|<  

Lynxiz checks out the deadend battle field in front of the chivitron 
base. She opens a commlink to Windlord, "Windlord. This is 
Lynxiz. I'm going to return to the Maximals. I'll probably return to 
visit soon." She waits for a reply.

Lokk and Axis shrug as they regard Seekker. Axis chuckles to 
himself, and enters the Chvitron base to replenish his energy and 
missiles. Lokk follows him, looking for bullets.
